abilities.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

name: Crystalys
description: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
trivia: Before version 5.40, Crystalys was named "Crystal Battlegear" and before 5.31, it was named "Crystal Defender".
Crystalis is the titular sword of the 1990 NES game of the same name.
